content:
That's a great idea! It's always exciting to see how many savings you can stack up.

Remember to carefully review the terms and conditions of each coupon and offer to ensure they can be combined with the Hill's Science Diet $5 off coupon. You don't want to miss out on any savings due to conflicting terms.

As you're checking your coupon binder and pet store loyalty apps, keep an eye out for any other deals that might be expiring soon. You might be able to plan your shopping trip around those offers to maximize your savings.

If you need any more help or have any questions, feel free to ask. I'll be here, cheering you on as you coupon like a pro!

Good luck, and happy shopping!
